subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A year ago, Eddy Curry was the Knicks’ No. 1 scoring option. Now Coach Isiah Thomas frequently leaves Curry on the bench in fourth quarters and sometimes for entire second halves.
snippet: A year ago, Eddy Curry was the Knicks’ No. 1 scoring option. Now Coach Isiah Thomas frequently leaves Curry on the bench in fourth quarters and sometimes for entire second halves.
